heading: Second video post
postText: The thing you’re doing now, reading prose on a screen, is going out of fashion. The defining narrative of our online moment concerns the decline of text, and the exploding reach and power of audio and video …

heading: In the Future We Will All Live in Star Wars
postText: Fog down the river, where it rolls deified among the tiers of shipping and the waterside pollutions of a great (and dirty)city. Fog on the Essex marshes, fog on the Kentish heights. Fog creeping into the cabooses of collier-brigs; fog lying out on.
